scenario_text.value: Unngh! Shuuji... This one’s strong!
I know! It’s in a whole other league!

But if nothing else, we can take it down with
us!
Hold on, Shuuji! We can’t be hasty here!

We should at least stall for time... Just
imagine what’ll happen if we don’t!

I’m the oldest one here! It’s my
responsibility!
We can’t retreat now!

You’re talking crazy! No one’s expecting you
to fall on a grenade like this!

Heh, I know that... I’m being selfish here.
Self-satisfaction, even.

But I believe this is the right choice. My
role is to take the lead and protect others.

No one’s making me do this. This is the
right way forward, one I chose myself!

Sorry, Lopmon, but please stick with me on
this path I’ve chosen.

Yeah! I believe in your righteousness,
Shuuji!
Owch! What...? I...ungh... Nnngaaaaaah!
Lopmon?!

This is...could it be?! Something from...
deep inside me...is...!
The power... It’s welling up!
AAAHHHHHHH!
*huff* *huff* *huff*... Shuu... Shuuji!
Now then... Let’s do this, Shuuji.
This is...your righteousness!
